pullRequest.title: WFLY-11808 Unable to do jndi lookup when starting batch job from web …
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-11808
Add support for jndi lookup in a batch job when started from Admin Console or CLI, by using the namespace context selector from the deployment.

nodes.bodyText: I think we should probably just pass the NamespaceContextSelector rather than the EEModuleDescription. It seems like we shouldn't be holding a reference to that in a service.
